category: Athletes’ Committee Regulations/Article 12 (Exclusion and avoidance of members)
contents: Article 12 (Exclusion and avoidance of members) ① Members may not participate in the deliberation and resolution of committee meetings in the following cases. 1. If the member, his or her spouse, or immediate descendant is an executive, employee, or shareholder of a corporation or organization that performs services related to the affairs and projects of the Sports Association. 2. Provides services or serves as an advisor in relation to the affairs and projects subject to deliberation. 3. If there is or was a special relationship. 3. If there are other significant reasons why the relevant duties cannot be carried out fairly. ② If any of the reasons in paragraph 1 applies, the committee members themselves avoid deliberation on the matter or the chairperson excludes them. [Full text] Revised 2019. 1. 31.]
